biography:
Jeffrey Alan "Jeff" Franklin  is an American television producer, writer, and director. He achieved most of his success in the 1980s and '90s, with family-oriented sitcoms like Full House, Hangin' with Mr. Cooper and Malcolm & Eddie. He has also been involved in other situation comedies, including Bosom Buddies, and Laverne & Shirley.
